title: Oath of the Ancients
content: by silver mist, you teleport to an unoccupied space you can see.Range: 18m Moonbeam Lv 2 Evocation ActionLevel 2 Spell Slot 2d10 RadiantCall down a silvery beam ofpale light that damages any creature that enters the beam or starts its turn in the light.You can use an action to move the beam 18m.10 turns18m1mCON Save Protection from Poison Lv 2 Abjuration ActionLevel 2 Spell Slot Touch a creature to neutraise all poisons affecting it, and grants it protection against poisonous influences.Grants A
